meanings.definition: The state of being united as one.
meanings.sent1: The onenesses of the team helped them win the championship.
meanings.sent2: The onenesses of the family was evident during the holiday gathering.
meanings.sent3: The onenesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete.
meanings.sent4: The onenesses of the orchestra created a harmonious symphony.
meanings.sent5: The onenesses of the colors in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: The quality or fact of being whole or undivided.
meanings.sent1: The onenesses of the cake made it delicious.
meanings.sent2: The onenesses of the plan ensured its success.
meanings.sent3: The onenesses of the jigsaw puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The onenesses of the melody captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The onenesses of the ingredients created a perfect dish.
